text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0937

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0937 version 3.0.0
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    AOEAsk at Order EntryAsk at Order Entry
    ASCAsk at Specimen CollectionAsk at Specimen Collection

name: LaboratoryObservationSubType
title: Laboratory Observation Sub-Type
description: Value Set of codes specifying an observation sub-type used with observation type code RSLT (Result).
